features.feature: 亲爱的用户，本次更新新增智慧识物-购物功能以及分屏组合，优化部分场景通知栏显示效果，新增洋葱学园应用，优化系统与部分三方应用兼容性，合入安全补丁，推荐您进行更新。
新增以图标形式保存分屏组合，点击图标即可快捷打开已保存分屏组合应用。
新增支持智慧识物-购物功能。
优化部分场景通知栏布局、动效以及图标显示效果。
新增洋葱学园应用。 优化系统与部分三方应用兼容性。
合入安卓2024年7月安全补丁，增强系统安全性。有关荣耀软件安全更新内容的信息，请访问荣耀官方网站 https://www.honor.com/cn/support/bulletin/2024/7
1. 本次更新不会删除您的用户数据，但仍建议您在更新前做好数据备份。 2. 更多精彩功能介绍，请访问“玩机技巧”应用。 3. 如果您在使用过程中遇到任何问题，请访问“我的荣耀”应用或访问荣耀官方服务网站 https://www.honor.com/cn/contact-us 寻求支持。

Dear user, this recommended update introduces AI object recognition and AI shopping functions, along with app combinations in split-screen mode. Additionally, Onion Academy is available in App Market. This release also optimizes the display effect of notification panel in some scenarios, improves the system compatibility with some third-party apps, and incorporates a security patch.
App combinations used in split-screen mode can be saved as icons, allowing quick access to the saved combinations.
AI object recognition and AI shopping functions are introduced.
The layout, motion effect and icon display effect of the notification panel are optimized in some scenarios.
Onion Academy is available in App Market. The system compatibility with some third-party apps is improved.

Android Security Patch (July 2024) has been incorporated for system security. For more information about HONOR Security updates, please visit our website https://www.honor.com/global/support/bulletin/2024/7

1. Installing this update will not erase your personal data, but a backup beforehand is still recommended. 2. Check out more information on product features in the Tips app. 3.
